    Let's Talk

Ruben Gutierrez: Professional Website Designer

Hello! My name is Ruben Gutierrez and I am a freelance website designer in La Habra, California. I've been working on computers since I was 10 and website for the past few years.

My interest with technology started when I received my first computer for Christmas around ten years old. When I wasn't taking it apart and putting it back together I was researching new ways to try and make it work faster and more efficiently. Fast forward a couple years and I began to help my friends and family fix their computers during the peak of the Windows XP security flaw days.

Now that I'm 30 I've focused my attention to website development and design.
